item.title: Unity - Package Manager - NuGetForUnity
item.description: Guide GlitchEnzo/NuGetForUnity Config 將資源調整放置 Packages 而不是 Assets NuGet > Preferences > Placement > In Packages Folder 調整 .gitignore /Packages/nuget-packages/InstalledPackages*
